item.title: Quick Tip : Installing Ruby 2.7 and Node 12 on RH8
item.description: Installing Ruby and Node on Redhat 8 Quick tip on how to install Ruby 2.7 and Nodejs 12 on Redhat 8, as it can default to older versions. # Enable new versions dnf -y module reset ruby nodejs dnf -y module enable ruby:2.7 nodejs:12 # Install dnf install nodejs ruby # Check installed versions ruby --version node --version npm --version
